title: Mexico Adults-Only Waterfront Boutique Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Nestled between a mirror-like lagoon and the thriving Mayan jungle, this holistic adults-only retreat offers unparalleled tranquillity. Designed with A-line thatched roofs, each tented room brings nature indoors while maintaining the utmost opulence.

Sitting on the water's edge, paddle through the lagoon, dive off a sailing boat or relax on a beanbag by the lagoon deck. Recentre yourself at the resortâ€™s wellness centre, with tailored massages or hydrating facials, ingredients from their own botanical garden and even private sessions of yoga and sound-healing.

Rooted in sustainability, Siete, the all-day eatery at Our Habitas Bacalar, celebrates plant-based cooking using ingredients handpicked from local farms. From breakfast to your evening cocktail, expect nothing but the most fresh and punchy flavours.
offer_address: Carretera Federal 307 Xul Ha, 77963 Bacalar, Q.R., Mexico
